job_title: Senior Business Analyst - ServiceNow APM Module
jd: Greetings, I hope this email finds you well. My name is Rajagopal, and I came across your resume in our database. I'm reaching out to explore potential opportunities as we have a vacancy for the position that I believe aligns well with your skills and experiences. Position: Senior Business Analyst - ServiceNow APM ModuleLocations: Frisco TX , Kansas City MO , Atlanta GA (Need locals to any of these 3 locations)Duration: Long Term Contract Job Description:Facilitate workshops with Client stakeholders(Dev, Architect and Product/Process Owners) to gather detailed requirements for application rationalization, ensuring that all business, technology, and cost perspectives are captured in the APM solution.Collaborate with technical teams on APM architecture and solution design. Ensure that business requirements are translated into functional specifications for ServiceNow APM implementation.(Requires hands-on experience of ServiceNow APM Module)Conduct data analysis and portfolio assessments, providing insights on application cost, risk, and business fit, to guide decision-making in the rationalization process. Experience in creating dashboards/reports in ServiceNow and user stories for development. Certifications : ServiceNow Certified System Administrator (Mandatory), Additional CIS(Certified implementation Specialist) APM or other CIS certifications.
